title: Derating factors
fullText:
Allowance should be made for manufacturing tolerances on module output. For example, where tolerance is Â±5% on output current or power, a derating factor of 0.95 should be applied to these quantities.
For temperature derating see Clauses 3.4.3.7 to 3.4.3.9.
Typical derating factors for soiling vary from 1.00 (no derating) to 0.90. The lower figure would apply at sites which are both dusty and where regular cleaning is impractical.
